There are so many reasons why I love Mortiz.  First off, an explanation: Moritz is many different things to many different people.  First and foremost, it's a Catalan brewery where some excellent beer is made!  It's also an amazing bar/restaurant, and wine bar (There are actually two different menus served, depending on if you're in the beer or wine zones of the establishment.  Both are fabulous).  Moritz has *great* food and *great* beverages.  It's big, and though service is friendly and generally on the ball, there can be a few moments when you feel like you're not receiving the attention you deserve (particularly at the slightly uncompetitive pricepoint at which they operate).  That said, Moritz is an *excellent* place to grab a meal or drink with friends.Perhaps my favorite thing about Moritz, though, is the bakery attached to the restaurants/bars...  The bread is reasonably priced and of a quality absolutely unmatched in the city!  Moritz is now my only source of bread, and I can't get enough!This place is a gem, and fully worth a visit :)
